headline: Oracle (ORCL): Has the Recent Pullback Opened a Long-Term Value Opportunity?
summary: Oracle (ORCL) has quietly pulled back over the past month, even as its year to date and multi year returns remain strong. That combination makes the current setup interesting for long term investors. See our latest analysis for Oracle. The recent pullback, including a roughly 19 percent 30 day share price return, comes after a strong run. The year to date share price return remains solidly positive and multi year total shareholder return remains exceptional, signaling that momentum is cooling...
